scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n SHARED,TRPC,SERVER,CLIENT -c yellow,magenta,blue,green "pnpm --filter=shared build:watch" "pnpm --filter=trpc build:watch" "pnpm --filter=server dev" "pnpm --filter=client dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter=shared build && pnpm --filter=trpc build && pnpm --filter=server build && pnpm --filter=client build
scripts.tsc:check: pnpm --filter=shared tsc && pnpm --filter=trpc tsc && pnpm --filter=server tsc && pnpm --filter=client tsc
scripts.prepare:validate: pnpm tsc:check && pnpm lint:check && pnpm test:coverage && pnpm format:check
scripts.deploy:prepare: pnpm deploy --filter=client --prod deploy/client && pnpm deploy --filter=server --prod deploy/server
scripts.deploy:post: shx mkdir -p deploy/server/db && shx touch deploy/server/db/sessions.sqlite
scripts.prepare:artifacts: pnpm deploy:clean && pnpm build && pnpm deploy:prepare && pnpm deploy:post
